documents.title: Q4 2025 Project Status Report
documents.content:
## Q4 2025 Project Status Report

### Executive Summary
Project Alpha is 85% complete with three critical milestones remaining.

### Budget Status
- Allocated: $2.4M
- Spent: $1.95M (81.25%)
- Remaining: $450K
- Projected overrun: $120K (5%)

### Key Risks
1. **Vendor Dependency (HIGH)**: Primary cloud vendor has announced pricing changes effective Q1 2026, potentially increasing infrastructure costs by 30%.
2. **Staffing Gap (MEDIUM)**: Two senior engineers departing in December. Knowledge transfer incomplete for the authentication module.
3. **Timeline Pressure (HIGH)**: Client demo scheduled for Dec 15, but integration testing has revealed 23 critical bugs.
4. **Security Audit (MEDIUM)**: Penetration testing scheduled for Nov 20 - results may require architectural changes.

### Milestones
- [x] Core API development (Oct 1)
- [x] Database migration (Oct 15)
- [x] Frontend redesign (Nov 1)
- [ ] Integration testing (Nov 30)
- [ ] Security audit remediation (Dec 10)
- [ ] Client demo (Dec 15)

documents.title: Engineering Team Handbook
documents.content:
## Engineering Team Handbook

### Onboarding
1. Set up development environment (see setup.sh)
2. Complete security training
3. Review coding standards document
4. Shadow a senior engineer for first sprint

### Code Review Process
- All PRs require 2 approvals
- Security-sensitive changes require team lead review
- Use conventional commit messages
- Maximum PR size: 400 lines

### Deployment Checklist
1. Run full test suite locally
2. Update changelog
3. Create release tag
4. Deploy to staging
5. Run smoke tests
6. Deploy to production
7. Monitor error rates for 30 minutes

documents.title: Product Requirements: Customer Portal v2
documents.content:
## Product Requirements: Customer Portal v2

### Features
1. **Dashboard Redesign**: Real-time metrics with customizable widgets
2. **Self-Service API Keys**: Users can generate and rotate API keys
3. **Usage Analytics**: Detailed usage graphs with export capability
4. **Team Management**: Invite members, assign roles, manage permissions

### Acceptance Criteria
- Dashboard loads in under 2 seconds
- API key generation completes within 500ms
- Analytics data refreshes every 5 minutes
- Role changes take effect immediately

### Technical Constraints
- Must support 10,000 concurrent users
- 99.9% uptime SLA
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance
- SOC 2 Type II compliance required

artifact.title: Q4 Risk Assessment Report

risks.name: Vendor Dependency
risks.mitigation: Begin multi-cloud evaluation immediately. Prepare migration playbook for top 2 alternative providers. Negotiate long-term contract with current vendor for price lock.

risks.name: Staffing Gap
risks.mitigation: Accelerate knowledge transfer sessions (daily 1-hour pairing). Document all undocumented systems. Cross-train 2 mid-level engineers on auth module.

risks.name: Timeline Pressure
risks.impact: Client demo may reveal critical bugs
risks.mitigation: Triage bugs by client-facing impact. Fix top 10 critical bugs first. Prepare fallback demo with known-good paths. Communicate timeline risk to client.

risks.name: Security Audit
risks.mitigation: Pre-audit security review using OWASP checklist. Address known vulnerabilities before formal audit. Reserve 2-week sprint for remediation.

artifact.summary: 4 risks identified, 2 HIGH severity. Recommended immediate actions: vendor negotiation, accelerated knowledge transfer, and bug triage prioritization.

results.title: Q4 2025 Project Status Report
results.snippet: Key Risks: Vendor Dependency (HIGH), Staffing Gap (MEDIUM), Timeline Pressure (HIGH)...

subagentResult.findings:
Analysis complete. Identified 4 risk mitigation strategies with priority ranking:
1. **Immediate**: Vendor price lock negotiation (saves ~$720K/year)
2. **Urgent**: Knowledge transfer acceleration (2-week intensive program)
3. **High Priority**: Bug triage and selective fix strategy (focus on demo-blocking issues)
4. **Planned**: Pre-audit security hardening (OWASP top 10 checklist)
